column4: I have a config file in /usr/local/web/config.php and the folder /usr/local/web is owned by admin and the group is a group that www-data is a member of and it has rwx on folder web.  The webserver chokes unless the folder is owned by www-data.  Any ideas.
what are the perms on that folder?
what error do you get?  And simply changing that folder to www-data:webgroup makes it not error?
